ctx: intros d c pl tl Hcompat Hreconnait.
exceptions.exn: In environment a : ad a0 : prec_list d : preDTA c : ad pl : prec_list tl : ad Hcompat : term_list Hreconnait : mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list a a0) Unable to unify "prec_list" with "state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a a0) (app tl Hcompat)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (a : ad) (a0 : prec_list), union_s_prd1 (M1 prec_list a a0)

Premises:
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
union_s_prd1 = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
ad = N : Set
mpl_compat_8_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : prec_list), mpl_compat_8_def (M1 prec_list a a0)
union_s0d_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : prec_list), union_s_prd0 (M1 prec_list a a0)
st_compatible_compat_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : prec_list), st_compatible_compat_def (M1 prec_list a a0)
mpl_compat_7_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : prec_list), mpl_compat_7_def (M1 prec_list a a0)
predta_compatible_compat_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : state), predta_compatible_compat_def (M1 state a a0)
borne_0_1 : forall (a : ad) (p' p : prec_list), prec_in_state (M1 prec_list a p') p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M1 prec_list a p')
pl_compatible_cons_l : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_compatible (prec_cons a la ls) p -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0
pl_compatible_cons_r : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_compatible p (prec_cons a la ls) -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0
upl_conv_0_img : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), upl_conv_0 p = prec_cons a la ls -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0
upl_conv_1_img : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), upl_conv_1 p = prec_cons a la ls -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0
mpl_compat_0 : forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl0) (M1 prec_list c pl1) -> pl_compat pl0 pl1
MapPut_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (MapPut A (M0 A) a y) a0 = MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0
MapPut_semantics_2_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y y' : A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (MapPut A (M1 A a y) a y') a0 = (if (a =? a0)%N then Some y' else None)
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
upl_conv_0_img_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), upl_conv_0 p = prec_cons a la ls -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 /\ a = uad_conv_0 a0 /\ la = upl_conv_0 la0 /\ ls = upl_conv_0 ls0
upl_conv_1_img_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), upl_conv_1 p = prec_cons a la ls -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 /\ a = uad_conv_1 a0 /\ la = upl_conv_1 la0 /\ ls = upl_conv_1 ls0
mpl_compat_3 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_4 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
MapDelta_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A) (m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y y' : A), MapGet A (M1 A a0 y0) a = Some y -> MapGet A m' a = Some y' -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a0 y0) m') a = None
MapDelta_semantics_1_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = None -> MapGet A m' a0 = None -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = None
MapDelta_semantics_2_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = None -> MapGet A m' a0 = Some y0 -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = Some y0
MapDelta_semantics_2_2 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = Some y0 -> MapGet A m' a0 = None -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = Some y0
union_s1d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> a <> c -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
prec_occur_ind : forall P : prec_list -> ad -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> P pl0 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> P pl1 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> P p a
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
MapPut_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (a a' : ad) (y y' : A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (MapPut A (M1 A a y) a' y') a0 = (if (a' =? a0)%N then Some y' else if (a =? a0)%N then Some y else None)
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p

```coq
intros a a0.
unfold union_s_prd1.
intros d c pl tl Hcompat Hreconnait.
apply union_s0d_1.
Qed.

original: intros a a0. unfold union_s_prd1. intros d c pl tl Hcompat Hreconnait. apply union_s0d_1.
